author: amaltaro
body: Create a python3 `pycodestyle` spec, which has no other dependencies; remove the `py3-pep8`, which was only used by WMCore; last but not least, update `py3-pylint` to `2.13.5` and bring in all the necessary updates and new specs that it depends on.
title: New spec for Py3 pycodestyle; added to wmcorepy3-devtools
